channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sean "Diddy" Combs will remain in NYC jail after withdrawing bail appeal
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs filed a motion Friday to dismiss his appeal for bail, meaning he will stay in jail until his trial on sex trafficking charges in Ma...

item.title: Supreme Court to consider whether Catholic group is exempt from religious taxes
item.description: At issue is whether the charity Catholic Charities is qualified to be exempt from state unemployment taxes as a religious institution.

item.title: Parts of Midwest brace for ice; Michigan first responders dash to safety during major crash
What we know about the mysterious drones buzzing over New Jersey
item.description: The US government says the flying objects pose no threat to national security, but their origin and intentions remain unclear.

item.title: Texas challenges shield laws by suing New York doctor who prescribed abortion pills

item.title: Nancy Pelosi in hospital after injury on overseas trip
item.description: The former House speaker suffered an unspecified injury while on an official trip to Luxembourg, her office says.

item.title: 'I wasn't me any more' - a photographer tackles her postnatal depression
item.description: Through her work, Dola Posh shares her story to help other new mothers deal with complex feelings.

item.title: Prince Andrew says he 'ceased all contact' with alleged Chinese spy
item.description: Questions have been raised over the prince's relationship with a Chinese businessman alleged to be a spy who was later banned from the UK.

item.title: People in Syria Lost and Found

item.title: 'I felt like a breathing corpse': Stories from people freed from Syria's torture prison
item.description: The BBC speaks to men released from Saydnaya prison - a place known as the "human slaughterhouse".

item.title: Drones, planes or UFOs? Americans abuzz over mysterious New Jersey sightings
McConnell warns RFK Jr. against effort to undermine polio vaccines
item.description: Aaron Siri, an attorney to Robert F. Kennedy Jr., petitioned the FDA to "withdraw or suspend" its approval of a polio vaccine.
